see, sea, look, lake

𒈾 𒈲 | see, look | na-zir ( vs 𒂔 zir ?) 𒈾 𒋫 𒇻 | see, look | na-ṭa-raᵐ naṭara
𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 | see, look | na-adze-urn nadzurⁿ نَظَرَ naẓara < [mandzar]
𓈖 𓍯 𓄿 𓁺 | see, look | 𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌴𐌹 ?

𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌴𐌹𐌽 nachsehen ansehen anäugen vinayen निगाह करना nigāh karnā نگاه کردن negâh kardan
𐌱𐌹𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌾𐌰𐌽 benιuḫsɕen beneugsen ⋍ 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 benäugen beneigen abneigen abwägen

𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 | see, look | nigaristan нигаристан نگریستن negaristan نیشتن niyašten нигоҳ кардан nigoh kardan angalia
𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 | see, look | NADZAR : 𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌴𐌹𐌽𐍃 𐌱𐌹𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌾𐌰𐌽 ნახვა naxva nlooks 𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌾 > נִרְאָה nir'á
𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 | see, look | NADZAR : SIGHT, LOOK @arab/semit ነጸረ näṣärä نَظَرَ naẓara نظر nazár néz 𓂊 𓂉 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 | see, look | 𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌴𐌹 ⇔ naked 𐌽𐌰𐌵𐌰𐌸𐍃 𒉈𒆪𒈠𒀭𒍝 nekumanza nhɔk@Thai ⇔ Netzhaut "capture"

𓌴 𓁹 𓄿 𓄿 ⇔ vulture
𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | •nadzar نَظَر naẓar nazar (Semit, Turk, Malay!) נשר nesher
𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | •nadzar nattoraliusaq ⇔ nattoralik (“eagle”) @ Greenlandic
𓌴 𓁹 𓄿 𓄿 | see, look | naẓara (𓌴 new sight) mandzar > mazar > ma'ir mir

𓅐 𓄿 𓅀 ⇔ necro 𓊻

𒀭𒀝 𒆪𒁺𒌨𒊑 𒋀 Nabû-kudurriⁿuṣur "guard my heir" Nebuchadnesar permuted

𓁹 𓂂 Netzhaut

𓌴 ⲛⲁⲩ < nadzar (look, behold, watch) ⇔ nexus

[mandzar] :

𓈖 mandzar ⇔ measure

𓈖 | mandzar : look, sight, view Hin manzar, Per mandzar, Swa mandhari

nadzar : sight, look Aze nezer, Hin nazar, Per nadzar, Tur nazar, Uzb nazar / nadzara : look, watch / nattara : look, watch / nadzara : look, glance Hin nazara, Per nadzare / nashada : look for / nadzara : supervision, control Aze nezaret, Per nadzarat, Tur nezaret / nadzari : theoretical Aze nezeri, Per nadzari / nadzaria : point of view / theory Hin nazriya, Per nadzariye, Tur nazariyat

negative forms

𒆷 𒈾𒈲 la na-zir | disregard

𒆷𒈾𒋫𒇻 la na-ṭa-lu lo¬ nadzar
𒆷𒈾𒋫𒇻 be blind ???, to not see

reconnoiter
